phrs.translation: 细发辫, 骇人长发绺, 脏辫儿

sentences.sentence: "There's lots of good bands coming through, a lot of them," said Mr. Norris, who carried a cane and had a single synthetic green dreadlock threaded onto his last wisp of natural hair.
sentences.translation: “有不少好乐队出现，有很多呢，”诺里斯说道，他拄着一支拐杖，头发末端系着一根假的绿色雷鬼辫。
